text: Gytis Radzevičius (born 17 July 1995) is a Lithuanian professional basketball player for Rytas Vilnius of the Lithuanian Basketball League.http://www.lkl.lt/zaidejai/gytis-radzevicius ==Playing career== Radzevičius started his professional career in KK Kupiškis basketball team. He moved to National Basketball league in 2015-16 season, when he signed with BC Perlas.https://www.basketnews.lt/news-89264-perlo-mru-gretose-du-rkl-zibeje- krepsininkai.html He spent the 2019-20 season with Juventus Utena where he averaged 11.7 points and 5.5 rebounds per game. On 29 July 2020, Radzevičius signed with Rytas Vilnius. ==References== Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:BC Juventus Category:Small forwards Category:Sportspeople from Vilnius
title: Gytis Radzevičius
